title: Alternative Reality Game-Based Capstone Design for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational game design, social issue analysis methodologies, and team project experience
context.additional_context: Creative Problem-Solving Competency Emphasis Through Real-World Problem Simulations Based on UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

learning_goals: Students can produce game scenarios that solve real-world social problems by utilizing the Alternate Reality Game (ARG) design process.
Learners enhance their ability to analyze complex social issues and derive creative solutions through team-based Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners acquire project management competencies to implement game mechanics in constrained technological environments (smartphone-centric) and conduct user testing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
